statement.p: In 17.02 of the last 47 days it rained. How many days did it not rain? days

solution.p: We recall that a percent as a decimal is part/whole. Here that is \displaystyle\frac{{P}}{{47}}={0.1702}. We solve for P by multiplying by \displaystyle{47}. \displaystyle{P}={0.1702}\cdot{47}={7.9994}. This is the number of days that it rained. We want the non-rainy days which is 47-7.9994=39.0006 We round that as requested to 39.
